animeTitle: Kira Kira 5th Anniversary Live Anime: Kick Start Generation
animeDescription: Based on the visual novel by Overdrive.   The what-if story reunites the Second Literature Club Band members Kirari, Chie, Shikanosuke, and Sarina, several months after the concert in the d2b vs Deardrops ~Cross the Future~ fan disk.   (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Takahashi Ken', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Storyboard', 'Animation Director']], ['Kameyama Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Minato Mirai', ['Storyboard']], ['Hayashi Yuki', ['Color Setting']]]
